attributes.title: The worst the EVER😡
attributes.review: This app gave me nothing but trouble I can’t believe I ever thought having this to support this man was EVER a good idea it’s horrible.Drains your battery and storage and no way in hell am I paying for more I don’t make much for little store owner in the south. Anyways to whoever is reading dont even think about getting it, it is the WORST APP EVER.

attributes.title: I have explosive diarrhea because of this app
attributes.review: So I wanted to get this app REALLY BAD because I was hearing a bunch of 𝓰𝓻𝓮𝓪𝓽 things about it, but right when I was trying to download it, my phone lit on FIRE and I couldn’t get it. I was motivated to get this app so after sticking my phone in some rice I came right back here. Sadly as the app was opening some horrid ear rape started playing so I had to go to the hospital. As I was sitting in the hospital I was thinking about my intense longing for this app. I couldn’t take not having this app created for our racist, homophobic, sexist, fascist, incompetent, narcissistic, ignorant and unfit (and ugly) president on my phone. Once I left the hospital I realized... if all this stuff was happening so I couldn’t get the app it’s probably for a reason. Don’t get this app I’m pretty sure it’s cursed.

attributes.title: horrible 😔🤬
attributes.review: this app took weeks to download when all i wanted to do was show support for barron trump and his family 🤬🤬 upon opening the app after waiting AGES a black screen popped up calling me a racial slur !!!!!! the screen said to delete the app and that i was not allowed to view the contents of the app because the data the app collected from my phone alerted the app that i was a poc 😔😔😔 this app stole my data to sell and even discriminated against me without even seeing me 🤡🤡 im hurt and thus i am writing this review now -1000/10

attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: I tried downloading it and it took me days to finally have it, but when I finally got it it would make my phone glitch a lot even when I’m not using the app when I try going on YouTube it would take me to this app or to other apps. Yup don’t like it 👎

attributes.title: -100/10 - had to call an exterminator 🙈
attributes.review:
While this app downloaded I experienced glitches in my phone, awful music started playing and I fainted from the frequency of the music. Once it FINALLY downloaded after 6 hours of the screeching music, my phone suddenly stopped working. Then it got really bad. Rats infested my home, my power went out, and then the worst thing of all, the moths. Thousands of moths swarmed my house! This made no sense to me because I had no lights on due to the power outage, then I realized it was the app. I tried to delete it but my phone was on fire, I had to put it in my neighbors freezer to cool it down ( my freezer was down due to the power outage) when I finally deleted it. Everything went back to normal as my favorite song Replay, by Jason Derulo played. Do not download this app unless you wish to bring terror into your house. If I could give this app a lower rating I would, -1000/10. It’s a no from me. 
Xoxo,
Gossip girl
